lead_paragraph: Experts say that the sports environment, where coaches have close relationships with children and easy access to them, can keep children from reporting sexual abuse.
snippet: Experts say that the sports environment, where coaches have close relationships with children and easy access to them, can keep children from reporting sexual abuse.
